alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 03 at 2:49AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts in excess of 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Widespread strong crosswinds could create significantly hazardous travel for all motorists on Interstate 25 between mile markers 60 and 90...especially for light weight and high profile vehicles...including light load semis and those towing camper trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
